channel.description: Recent content in RuBE on AICube.FUN

item.title: Face Swapping in Images using Automatic1111
item.description: Introduction Face swapping is the process of replacing a face in an image with a different face, while maintaining the original facial expression and head position. This can be done using AI tools like Stable Diffusion and Automatic1111. In this post, we will discuss how to use Automatic1111 and its RuBE extension to easily swap faces in images.
